canonical_code< pattern_props, vertex_t, edge_t, ALLOC > Class Template Reference

#include <generic_classes.h>

Detailed Description

template<class pattern_props, typename vertex_t, typename edge_t, template< typename > class ALLOC>
class canonical_code< pattern_props, vertex_t, edge_t, ALLOC >

Class represents a generic canonical code.

A canonical code is a unique (minimum or maximum) code for a pattern from amongst all the codes for the pattern. It takes 3 template arguments, the first is the pattern_properties, the second is the vertex_tpe and the third is the edge_type
